items.sentence: I\'ve been trying to figure out what Tom might have been doing at that time.
If there\'s anything you want to do, you should do it if it makes you happy.
Tom got used to living in Boston even though he\'d grown up in a small town.
I\'m not sure why Tom said those things, but I bet he now wishes he hadn\'t.
I\'ve spent so many years as chairman that I feel it\'s time I stepped down.
